steps.reasoning: The user is asking for quick dinner ideas with ingredients that are commonly available. I'll search for some popular dinner ingredients that would be widely available in grocery stores.

data.esql:
FROM grocery_items
| WHERE name: "quick dinner ingredients" OR category: "quick dinner ingredients" OR description: "quick dinner ingredients"
| LOOKUP JOIN store_inventory ON item_id
| WHERE stock_status != "out_of_stock"
| EVAL final_price = CASE(on_sale, sale_price, current_price)
| STATS avg_price = AVG(final_price), 
        min_price = MIN(final_price),
        max_price = MAX(final_price),
        stores_available = COUNT_DISTINCT(store_id)
  BY item_id, name, brand, category, unit_size, organic, gluten_free, vegan
| WHERE stores_available > 0
| SORT avg_price ASC
| LIMIT 20

  BY item_id, name, brand, category, unit_size, organic, gluten_free, vegan
